info.name: Ventral pallidum
info.description: Located ventral to the anterior commissure, the ventral pallidum is an extension of the globus pallidus. It receives input from the ventral striatum. It is part of the basal ganglia circuitry that has afferent and efferent connections with the limbic system.
info.item: /Sections/Thick, Whole Brain/Coronal/ Frontal to Occipital/6 Cor: Fr to Occ
/Sections/Thick, Whole Brain/Coronal/ Frontal to Occipital/5 Cor: Fr to Occ
